roleset.name: choose as more desirable

example.name: All args
example.text: To patient, surgery is favorable to chemo-radiation.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to prefer.01. Prefer.01 is a member of VN classes admire-31.2 and want-32.1-1-1. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Close to 450 people show up to register to vote , and the mood of the crowd is not favourable to the council .
